tool_description: Creates high-fidelity visual mockups for mobile screens by combining wireframes with visual design elements, colors, typography, and imagery.

wireframe_data.description: Wireframe structure data from wireframe generation

content_type.description: Primary content type: text-heavy, image-heavy, mixed, data-visualization, or minimal

visual_hierarchy.description: Visual hierarchy approach: balanced, top-heavy, center-focused, or bottom-heavy

imagery_style.description: Imagery style: photography, illustrations, icons-only, or mixed

error_messages: Invalid wireframe data: Provide valid wireframe structure data
Invalid color format: All colors must be in hex format (e.g., #FF5722)
Invalid content type: Use text-heavy, image-heavy, mixed, data-visualization, or minimal
Invalid visual hierarchy: Use balanced, top-heavy, center-focused, or bottom-heavy
Invalid imagery style: Use photography, illustrations, icons-only, or mixed
Missing required data: Ensure wireframe_data, typography_config, and component_library are provided
usage: Provide wireframe_data, color_scheme, typography_config, component_library, and content_type; optionally set visual_hierarchy and imagery_style to generate detailed visual mockups.

mockup_description.description: Detailed description of the visual mockup design

element_styling.description: Styling details for each UI element

color_usage.description: How colors are applied throughout the design

asset_requirements.description: Required image and icon assets for the mockup
